items.t: #J The keyboard toolbar is offset incorrectly on iPhone 5 #ios
#Grant I can't repro this. Is it a consistent problem or did it just happen once? Where is it offset? -J

#J When he opened the app, the bar was offset by what i would expect in the web version (the builtin bar above the keyboard). It was consistently opened by that extra amount, but we did not restart the app to see if it was still happening then. -Grant
#Grant Was this broken because of not correctly loading that it was the app correctly a few versions ago? Or is it still a problem? -J

#J Playing around a bit in the site version I was able to get the keyboard toolbar to do strange things - unfortunately nothing reproducable. Once it was through opening the contacts autocomplete and playing with that. -Grant
#J It happens consistently on the iPhone 4, but not on the 5s. The 4 is on iOS 7.0.3. -Grant
